prompts: Create a grassy deer Pokemon with large leafy antlers and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in lush forests and changes with the seasons.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon with brown fur and vibrant green foliage.
Show me a quadrupedal Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature and harmony.
Generate a Pokemon with a gentle personality, perfect for calming its surroundings.
Make a seasonal Pokemon that transitions through colors and features with each season.
Give me a unique Pokemon that represents the beauty and diversity of woodland creatures.
